name: World Destroyers
description: World Destroyers is a fast-paced, skill-testing, multiplayer space shooter that pays homage to classic games such as Asteroids, but with modern high-speed action.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Dual Core 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: GamePad HIGHLY recommended. (XBOX 360 controller or similar) Keyboard/Mouse is supported but in game instructions are lacking.  Sorry.
